## Source: amazon-inspector (61eaca42a219c9b161768c7938d34f6bc4d6e169c5ae43e88acf7a8a70be537b)
The package vue3-transpiler was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3c37154ecf9fa5381423abe7c4937cb9d0c82ceff3f8964dc0049f1dd6751f0d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vue3-transpiler' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
